table.name: vtiger_dart_recordchanges
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_dart_recordchanges` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL, `crmid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `smownerid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `modifiedby` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `modifiedon` date DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `unique_cols_constraint` (`module`,`crmid`,`smownerid`,`modifiedby`,`modifiedon`), KEY `idx_modifiedon` (`modifiedon`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
